item.description:
One common interest: Pub Crawls.

This group is intended to bring together the most social, fun-loving, active pub patrons and drinking buddies for periodic pub crawls that take place in and around Boston.

Our plan is to host at least one pub crawl every few months.

Despite the name, we actually do not encourage binge drinking or drinking to excess, and obviously everyone needs to be at least 21.  We feel pub crawls are a great way to meet new and exciting people while having a great time.  New to the city and looking to meet some people?  Single and looking for romance?  Looking for something fun and exciting to do with your friends?  Or just simply looking to gain new friends from outside your current circles?  This is one of the best ways to do just that.

Feel free to bring along others you know!  Please maintain your own tab and be courteous to your bartenders and fellow pub crawlers.  When RSVP'ing be sure to let us know of your ideas for other crawls!  We are open to new places to host pub crawls.

Happy Crawling!
item.name: Pub Crawlers of Boston
